ModInfo.description:
Power shared is power contested. Every 10 turns, elevate a new family head to the throne â€” or keep your current leader, if the other families will allow it.
Difficulty Levels: - Stable (default): Re-election requires Cautious+ opinion from all families. +8 legitimacy per election. - Strained: Re-election requires Pleased+ opinion. +6 legitimacy per election. - Fragile: Re-election requires Friendly+ opinion. +4 legitimacy per election. Enable Strained or Fragile in game setup under Rules.
Rules: - Elections occur every 10 turns starting at turn 10 - Candidates are family heads who are adult, healthy, and not the current leader - Each candidate must come from a different family - The current leader may run for re-election, but only if all families meet the opinion threshold - The winning candidate's family gains +20 opinion for 20 turns - All other families lose 20 opinion for 20 turns
